author: mmusich
body:
Greetings,
this PR is meant to update/ add tools used for the creation of Strip conditions for simulation, starting from existing payloads in database.
   * `SiStripChannelGainFromDBMiscalibrator`: reads APV gains (either G1 or G2) from DB and applies hierarchically a scale factor and/or gaussian smearing for each APV gain, down to the individual layer or disk level. 
   * `SiStripNoisesFromDBMiscalibrator` : reads Noise from DB and applies hierarchically a scale factor and/or gaussian smearing for each APV gain, down to the individual layer or disk level.

Code has been refactored to avoid duplication, moving common methods to an helper file; in addition the configuration and existing documentation have been updated.
title: Update SiStrip Miscalibration Tools [10.2.X]
